Address.university_name: Aristoteleio Panepistimio Thessalonikis – University of Thessaloniki (AUTH)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1925. An autonomous institution under the supervision of the Ministry of Education. Financed by the State
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) or recognized foreign equivalent and entrance examination

Divisions.Details:
https://www.auth.gr/en/university_unit/unescochair-edu-en
UNESCO Chair and Network: International Network of Water - Environment Centres for the Balkans: https://www.auth.gr/en/university_unit/inweb-en

Address.college_name: National and Kapodistrian University of Athens
Address.university_name: Ethniko kai Kapodistriako Panepistimio Athinon – University of Athens (NKUA)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded in 1837. The first university after the foundation of the Greek state and the only university in Greece until 1925/1926. Acquired present title 1932. Autonomous institution under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) or foreign equivalent and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1974 as one of the five “K.A.T.E.E.” (Centres of Highest Technical Professional Education). Became a Τechnological Educational Institution (TEI) 1983 and became officially part of the higher education system in 2001 when it became the Technologiko Ekpaideutiko Idryma Athinas (Athens University of Applied Science). Acquired current title and status in 2018 following merger with the Technological Educational Institute of Piraeus (Technologiko Ekpaideutiko Idrima, Piraea). The establishment of the newly established University Institution came through the process of merging the Technological Educational Institute of Athens and the Technological Educational Institute of Piraeus (Technologiko Ekpaideutiko Idrima, Piraea).The National School of Public Health (ESDY) was integrated into the University in 2019.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolitirio Likiou) and central selection by Ministry of Education

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1920 as an Independent Higher Education Institute with university status under the name of the Highest Agricultural School of Athens (H.A.S.A.). Acquired present status and english title 1989. Acquired present greek title 1995 as it was known as Georgikon Panepistimion Athinon. Under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and entrance examination

Divisions.College: Natural Resources Management and Agricultural Engineering

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1837 as Royal School of Arts/ Polytechnic School.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate or recognized foreign equivalent

Address.college_name: Athens University of Economics and Business

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1920 as Higher School of Commercial Sciences. A state university under the supervision of the Ministry of Education.
GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: September to June (September-January; February-June including the exams)
AdmissionRequirements: National Entrance Examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1973. An autonomous institution under the supervision of the Ministry of Education.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and entrance examination

Divisions.College: Languages, Literature and Culture of Black Sea Countries

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1990.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1992. ISO 9001:2000. Started operating 1998.
AdmissionRequirements: 'Geniko apolytirio' or equivalent for undergraduate studies

GeneralInformation.History: The International Hellenic University (IHU) was established by Law (No 3391/2005) and was Greece’s first public university where programmes were taught exclusively in English. According to Law No 4610/2019, IHU has merged with the Alexander Technological Educational Institute of Thessaloniki, the Technological Educational Institute of Central Macedonia and the Technological Educational Institute of Eastern Macedonia and Thrace

Divisions.College: Economics, Business Administration and Legal Studies

GeneralInformation.History: Created 1811 in Ithaca as Ionian Academy by the British philhellene Frederic North. Moved to Corfu following the Greek War of Independence 1821. Officially started operating 1824. In 2018, according to law 4559/2018, the Technical Educational Institute of Ionian Islands merged with the Ionian University.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirio Lykiou)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1837 as Polytechnion focused on architectural education by a royal decree. Acquired present title 1871. Acquired university-level status 1887. Acquired status 1929. Reorganized 1982. An autonomous institution under the supervision of the Ministry of Education.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) or foreign equivalent and entrance examination

Address.college_name: Panteion University of Social and Political Sciences
Address.university_name: Panteion Panepistimio Oikonomikon kai Politikon Epistimon

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1930 as School of Political Sciences. Acquired present status 1963. Acquired present title 1989.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: School of Pedagogical and Technological Education
Address.university_name: Anotati Scholi Paidagogikis kai Technologikis Ekpaideusis (ASPETE)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1959 as SELETE, a Technical & Vocational Teacher Training Institute. Acquired present status and title 2002.
Founded 1977. Admitted first students 1984. Acquired present status 1993. An autonomous institution under the supervision of the Ministry of Education
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) or foreign equivalent and entrance examination

Address.university_name: Technologiko Ekpaideutiko Idryma Kritis (TEI of Crete)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1983
Founded 1973. A State institution under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of National Education and Religious Affairs.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate and Panhellenic entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1964 in Ioannina as a branch Department of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki's School of Philosophy. Acquired present status and title 1970. In 2018, according to law 4559/2018, the Technical Educational Institute of Epirus merged with the University of Ioannina. A state institution of the Epirus Region.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and entrance examination

Divisions.College: Cultural Heritage Management and New Technologies

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1948 as Graduate School of Industrial Studies. Acquired present status and renamed as Graduate School of Industrial Studies in Thessaloniki 1958. Previously the Graduate Industrial School of Thessaloniki. Acquired present title 1990.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1964. Acquired present status 1966. In June 2013 the University of Western Greece was incorporated in the University of Patras. According to law 4610/2019, The University of Patras has merged with the TEI of Western Greece (except for 4 departments)
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and national entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1938 as School of Industrial Studies. Renamed Higher School of Industrial Studies 1945. Acquired present status and renamed Graduate School of Industrial studies 1958. Acquired present title 1989
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytrion Lykiou) and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1920 as Ionian University in Smyrna. Acquired present status and title 1984. A State institution under the jurisdiction of the Ministry of Education.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2000. Started operating 2002. According to law 4610/2019, The University of the Peloponnese has merged with the TEI of Peloponnese and 4 departments of the TEI of Western Greece

Divisions.College: Human Movement and Quality of Life

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1984. According to law 4589/2019, the University of Applied Science of Thessaly has merged with the University of Thessaly
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Apolytirion Lykiou) and entrance examination

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2002. According to law 4610/2019, The University of Western Macedonia has merged with the TEI of Western Macedonia

Address.college_name: Western Greece University of Applied Science

GeneralInformation.History: Established 2013 following the merger between the former T.E.I. of Patras (founded 1983) and former T.E.I. of Mesolonghi (1983). An autonomous institution under the supervision of the Institute of Technological Education. Formerly Technological Educational Institute of Western Greece/T.E.I. of Patras-Technologiko Ekpaideutiko Idrima Patras.
